title: Tell me about a dish you recently tried to cook.

korean: 유튜브에서 레시피 보고 따라 해봤는데, 생각보다 어려웠어.
재료는 미리 다 준비했어. 파스타면, 베이컨, 달걀, 파르메산 치즈.
면 삶는 건 쉬웠는데, 소스 만드는 게 문제였어.
달걀이 익으면 안 되는데, 타이밍 맞추기가 어려웠어.
처음엔 너무 빨리 넣어서 달걀이 익어버렸어.
결국 다시 시작해서 두 번째 시도에 성공했어.
다음엔 좀 더 잘 만들 수 있을 것 같아.
english: Recently, I tried to make carbonara.
I followed a recipe on YouTube, but it was harder than I thought.
I prepared all the ingredients in advance: pasta, bacon, eggs, Parmesan cheese.
Boiling the noodles was easy, but making the sauce was the problem.
The eggs shouldn't cook, but timing was difficult.
At first, I added them too quickly and the eggs cooked.
Eventually I started over and succeeded on the second try.
The sauce came out smooth and creamy.
The taste was okay, but not as good as a restaurant.
Still, I felt proud making and eating it myself.
I think I can make it better next time.
I think practice is important for cooking.
